author: jianhe
msg: Merge r1606557 from trunk. YARN-2052. Embedded an epoch number in container id to ensure the uniqueness of container id after RM restarts. Contributed by Tsuyoshi OZAWA

author: jianhe
msg: YARN-2052. Embedded an epoch number in container id to ensure the uniqueness of container id after RM restarts. Contributed by Tsuyoshi OZAWA

author: stefan2
msg: For FSFS format 7, use code to construct the index part of r0
(write_revision_zero): Add SCRATCH_POOL parameter since there are plenty
of temporary objects.  Construct the item list /
index entries, use the index utilities to turn
them into the two 2 indexes and add them to r0.
